content:
Dear colleagues
you will find here the update on the activities of the CLAIRE covid19 task force

For comments please react on this thread
Gianluca Bontempi on behalf of the task force coordinators

Daily CLAIRE covid19 task force update
Daily update of the CLAIRE covid19 task force Date: March the 24th 2020 Mission statement: Leveraging artificial intelligence to help manage the Covid-19 crisis Task force coordinators TFC (alphabetical order): Tonio Ball, Gianluca Bontempi, Ricardo Chavarriaga, Emanuela Girardi, Holger Hoos, Ia...
